EmailTemplate.name: Diss Corporation
EmailTemplate.subject: Diss Corporation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
Thank you for contacting LegalZoom for your business services needs. In regard to your inquiry, to officially close your [State] Corporation you may be required to file Articles of Dissolution with your [state] Secretary of State.
LegalZoom can prepare the Dissolution documents and file it with the appropriate state agency on your behalf. For your reference, I have provided the fees and link to our Dissolution service below:
DISSOLUTION Standard Package | $129.00 + state fee + shipping (20 - 35 business days) Rush Package | $239.00 + state fee (10 - 15 business days)
TO GET STARTED: http://www.legalzoom.com/additional-business-services/articles-of-dissolution-corporation-llc.html
Upon Dissolution of your Corporation please contact the IRS directly: (800) 829-4933.
Please feel free to contact LegalZoom at (888) 381-8758 if you have any further questions. Our Business Formations Team business hours are {!snippetVariable.bizbsi_hours}.
Best regards,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} {!User.CompanyName} {!User.Address} {!User.Phone} ext. {!User.Extension}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
